name: VirusTotal
description: Automatic scan of uploaded files and ips optionally with the VirusTotal API.

VIRUSTOTAL_API_KEY.help: Key to authenticate with VirusTotal API.
VIRUSTOTAL_API_KEY.label: API key

VIRUSTOTAL_SCAN_FILE.help: Activate automatic scan of uploaded files with VirusTotal (only existing files).
VIRUSTOTAL_SCAN_FILE.label: Scan files

VIRUSTOTAL_SCAN_IP.help: Activate automatic scan of uploaded ips with VirusTotal.
VIRUSTOTAL_SCAN_IP.label: Scan IP addresses

VIRUSTOTAL_IP_SUSPICIOUS.help: Minimum number of suspicious reports before considering IP as bad.
VIRUSTOTAL_IP_SUSPICIOUS.label: Suspicious IP number

VIRUSTOTAL_IP_MALICIOUS.help: Minimum number of malicious reports before considering IP as bad.
VIRUSTOTAL_IP_MALICIOUS.label: Malicious IP number

VIRUSTOTAL_FILE_SUSPICIOUS.help: Minimum number of suspicious reports before considering file as bad.
VIRUSTOTAL_FILE_SUSPICIOUS.label: Suspicious file number

VIRUSTOTAL_FILE_MALICIOUS.help: Minimum number of malicious reports before considering file as bad.
VIRUSTOTAL_FILE_MALICIOUS.label: Malicious file number
